title: Front-end Web Development Learning Plan
description: A structured learning path for aspiring front-end developers to gain the necessary skills to build modern, responsive, and interactive web applications.

modules.title: Introduction to Web Development
modules.description: Understanding the basics of web development, the internet, and how browsers work.

resources.name: Introduction to HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

modules.title: HTML & CSS
modules.description: Learning the building blocks of web pages with HTML and styling them with CSS.

modules.title: JavaScript Fundamentals
modules.description: Understanding the scripting language that enables interactive web pages.

modules.title: Version Control with Git
modules.description: Learning how to manage and collaborate on code projects using Git.

modules.title: Responsive Design
modules.description: Creating web pages that work on any device and screen size.

modules.title: JavaScript Frameworks
modules.description: Learning modern JavaScript frameworks to build complex applications.

modules.title: Building Projects
modules.description: Applying knowledge by building real-world projects and portfolios.

modules.title: Advanced Topics
modules.description: Exploring advanced front-end development topics and best practices.

outcome: By the end of this learning plan, you will have a solid foundation in front-end web development, a portfolio of projects, and the skills necessary to build modern web applications.
